Package net.tangly.gleam.model

Interface JsonField<T,U>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the entity owning the field
U - type of the property
All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonArray, JsonProperty
public interface JsonField<T,U>
Defines the abstraction of a mapping between a Java property - simple type, another class mapped to a JSON entity, or a collection mapped to a JSON array - and a JSON property, type, or array.

  • Method Summary

    exports(T entity, @NotNull org.json.JSONObject object)
    Export the JSON value from the associated property after an optional conversion.

  • Method Details

    • imports

      void imports(@NotNull T entity, @NotNull @NotNull org.json.JSONObject object)
      Import the JSON value and set the associated property after an optional conversion. Multiple JSON values can be used if the object is a complex one.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity which property will be imported and set
      object - JSON object containing the values
      See Also:
      • JsonProperty.exports(Object, JSONObject)

    • exports

      void exports(@NotNull T entity, @NotNull @NotNull org.json.JSONObject object)
      Export the JSON value from the associated property after an optional conversion. Multiple JSON values can be written if the object is a complex one.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity which property will be exported as TSV value
      object - JSON object to write the TSV value(s)
      See Also:
      • JsonProperty.imports(Object, JSONObject)

    • key

      String key()
      Returns the JSON property key name storing the property in a JSON structure.
      Returns:
      key of the property

    • string

      static String string(org.json.JSONObject object, String key)
